chapter.para: Pepr3D is a 3D graphics editor designed for FDM printing with Prusa printers. It allows the user to quickly separate one object into several, which is required by the state-of-the-art 3D printers, if you want to print multi-material.
The project was developed by a group of students of Charles University, in Prague, Czech Republic. The project is open source, please check the license information for further details.
